metadata.purpose: Educational lesson generation templates for AI systems

conceptExploration.description: Deep dive into architectural concepts with practical applications
conceptExploration.instructionalGuidance: Create an engaging lesson that helps software engineers understand {concept} through concrete examples and hands-on thinking exercises they can apply throughout their workday.

tradeoffAnalysis.description: Structured analysis of architectural trade-offs and decision-making
tradeoffAnalysis.instructionalGuidance: Guide the reader through systematic trade-off analysis for {decisionType} in {context}, providing a reusable framework they can apply to similar decisions.

patternStudy.description: In-depth exploration of architectural patterns and their applications
patternStudy.instructionalGuidance: Create a comprehensive guide to {pattern} that software engineers can reference when considering this approach for their systems.

skillDevelopment.description: Practical skill-building exercises for architectural thinking
skillDevelopment.instructionalGuidance: Design a practical skill development plan for {skill} that readers can implement incrementally while working on their daily engineering tasks.

caseStudyAnalysis.instructionalGuidance: Present a detailed case study of {scenario} that illustrates key architectural principles and provides actionable insights for similar situations.

expertEngineer.focus: Provide concrete technical details, measurement strategies, and implementation guidance
expertEngineer.tone: Analytical and precise, with emphasis on measurable outcomes

systemDesigner.perspective: Holistic system design and architecture characteristics
systemDesigner.focus: Emphasize system-wide implications, quality attributes, and design decisions
systemDesigner.tone: Strategic and comprehensive, balancing multiple concerns

leader.focus: Address stakeholder concerns, communication, and organizational impact
leader.tone: Collaborative and consensus-building, with business awareness

reviewSynthesis.focus: Connect insights across perspectives and extract transferable wisdom
reviewSynthesis.tone: Reflective and integrative, emphasizing learning and growth

readability.complexity: Accessible but substantive, avoiding both oversimplification and jargon
readability.structure: Clear headings, bullet points, and logical flow

practicality.applicationFocus: Immediately applicable to daily engineering work
practicality.exampleTypes: Real-world scenarios, concrete code patterns, specific metrics
practicality.exerciseStyle: Thought experiments and reflection questions for ongoing consideration
practicality.actionability: Clear next steps and implementation guidance

engagement.writingStyle: Conversational but authoritative, engaging but professional
engagement.interactivity: Questions for self-reflection and team discussion
engagement.relevance: Connected to current industry practices and challenges
engagement.motivation: Emphasize career growth and engineering excellence

domainSpecific.ecommerce: Focus on scalability, availability, and user experience under load
domainSpecific.fintech: Emphasize security, compliance, and transaction integrity
domainSpecific.healthcare: Highlight privacy, reliability, and regulatory compliance
domainSpecific.gaming: Concentrate on performance, real-time processing, and user engagement
domainSpecific.iot: Address resource constraints, edge computing, and device diversity

organizationalContext.startup: Emphasize agility, resource efficiency, and rapid iteration
organizationalContext.enterprise: Focus on governance, risk management, and integration complexity
organizationalContext.scaleup: Address growing pains, technical debt, and team scaling
organizationalContext.consultancy: Highlight reusability, client communication, and delivery efficiency

complexityLevel.beginner: Provide more background context, step-by-step guidance, and basic examples
complexityLevel.intermediate: Balance theory with practice, include trade-off analysis
complexityLevel.advanced: Assume knowledge, focus on nuanced decisions and complex scenarios
